verses.text: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* Baldad \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Suhite \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w How|strong="H0575"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* wilt thou \w speak|strong="H6310"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w how|strong="H0575"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* be \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H5704"\w* strong \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*?

Doth \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w pervert|strong="H5791"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* doth \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* overthrow \w that|strong="H0518"\w* which \w is|strong="H0410"\w* \w just|strong="H6664"\w*?

\w Although|strong="H0518"\w* thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* hath left \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* iniquity:
Yet \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt arise early \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w and|strong="H0859"\w* wilt beseech \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*:

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt walk \w clean|strong="H2134"\w* \w and|strong="H6664"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3477"\w* presently \w awake|strong="H5782"\w* \w onto|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6664"\w* \w will|strong="H3477"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H5116"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w justice|strong="H6664"\w* peaceable:

Insomuch, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* thy former \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w small|strong="H4705"\w*, thy \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w things|strong="H1961"\w* would \w be|strong="H1961"\w* multiplied \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w inquire|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w search|strong="H2714"\w* diligently \w into|strong="H7223"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* memory \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*:

(\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w yesterday|strong="H8543"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* ignorant \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w*:)

\w And|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thee: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* utter \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w Can|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* rush \w be|strong="H3808"\w* green \w without|strong="H3808"\w* moisture? \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* sedge-bush \w grow|strong="H7685"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*?

When \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w in|strong="H5750"\w* flower, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w plucked|strong="H6998"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand, \w it|strong="H6440"\w* withereth \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* herbs.

\w Even|strong="H3651"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w are|strong="H0734"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H0734"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hypocrite shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*:

\w His|strong="H0834"\w* \w folly|strong="H3689"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* not please him, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w trust|strong="H4009"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w spiderâ€™s|strong="H5908"\w* \w web|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w lean|strong="H8172"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* prop \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*:

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* seemeth \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* moisture \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* cometh, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w rising|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* blossom \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* shoot \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* thick \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w heap|strong="H1530"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* abide.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w swallow|strong="H1104"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w deny|strong="H3584"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* say: \w I|strong="H0518"\w* know thee \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w For|strong="H1931"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w others|strong="H0312"\w* \w may|strong="H1931"\w* \w spring|strong="H6779"\w* \w again|strong="H6779"\w* out \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w*.

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* cast away \w the|strong="H2388"\w* simple, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* reach \w out|strong="H2388"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* evildoer:

\w Until|strong="H5704"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w be|strong="H8193"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w laughter|strong="H7814"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* rejoicing.

\w They|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H0369"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* thee, \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* confusion: \w and|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H8130"\w* dwelling \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H8130"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* stand.
